src.NN.SaveLoadModel module

src.NN.SaveLoadModel.LoadModel(path, name: str, weights=None)

Load model and weights:

Parameters:

  • path (str) – The path to the model

  • name (str) – File name without extension

  • weights (str) – Weight name (if not the same as ‘name’)

Return type:

segmentation_models.Unet model with loaded weights

src.NN.SaveLoadModel.SaveModel(model, path: str, name: str)

Saves model and weights:

Parameters:

  • model (segmentation_models.Unet) – The model to save

  • path (str) – The path to save the model

  • name (str) – File name without extension
